gen:link.msg:message: De gerapporteerde waarde van `ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan (één van) 233000, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `SectorWNT` gelijk is aan `Emancipatie`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU3_SectorWNT')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU3_SectorWNT return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU3_ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU3_ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

De gerapporteerde waarde van `ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan (één van) 233000, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `SectorWNT` gelijk is aan `Onderwijsgerelateerd`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU4_SectorWNT')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU4_SectorWNT return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU4_ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU4_ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

De gerapporteerde waarde van `ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan (één van) (165000, 196000, 214000, 233000), omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `SectorWNT` gelijk is aan `Media`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU2_SectorWNT')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU2_SectorWNT return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU2_ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU2_ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

De gerapporteerde waarde van `ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan (één van) (194000, 233000), omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `SectorWNT` gelijk is aan `Cultuur`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU1_SectorWNT')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU1_SectorWNT return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU1_ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNumericValueEQCovPU1_ApplicableMaximumRemunerationInstitution return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
